body.p:
Lancaster May 28th 1864
Hon T. E. Bramlette
Dear Sir
I recd yesterday a paper from the Inspector Generals office directing me to make all necessary arrangements to draft 95 men of the Enrolled Militia of this County.

I am at a loss what to do. The assessors of the County have given the enrollment so little attention that I am confident from my knowledge of the facts. and information that very few more that 2/3 of the militia has been reported. Will you be kind enough as to instruct me.

I remain your
Obt servt
W H. Whewitt

Ky State Militia
Lancaster Garrard Co. Ky
May 28 -- 1864
Whewitt W. H. clk
Garrard County Court

To the Gov. and by him referred for answer. Wants to be instructed as to his duty in relation to the draft. He does not think the assessor of the county have reported more than 2/3 of the Militia
Ans May 31 -- 1864 on letter book Page 321
Rec. I. G. O. May. 31 -- 1864
